Articles.Content:
Hello all, well here I am! I am actually not new to the forums or the game at all, I've been playing KSP since early 0.18 and I still play it to this day! I'm not new to the forums either, I've been lurking around this place since 2013 and I didn't decide to create an account until now. Anyways, hello all!

And no you can't insert me a name, that'd be impossible!

Wow, no one has replied to this yet?

You've been on since .18? All of a sudden I feel younger...

Whatever the name may be, a new plate of cookies is on it's way!

[insert greeting here]

No but really welcome to the boards

Wow, no one has replied to this yet?

You've been on since .18? All of a sudden I feel younger...

Whatever the name may be, a new plate of cookies is on it's way!

Yeah I was wondering the same thing..

And yeah I've been playing since early .18 and played a good amount until .23 which is when I somehow forgot about the game until .90 and now the current 1.03!

[insert greeting here]

No but really welcome to the boards

Haha I like the joke

And thank you guys for welcoming me!

Actually, the game has been updated to 1.0.4...

Dang, SQUAD really updated the game fast.
